item.description:
Do you like Grunk Rock, Jazz, Blues, Punk, Dance or Progressive Rock?
If so than come on down and checkout some very different bands all in one night at one club.
Each Band will have about 30 minutes at best. A wide variety of music.

Some of them I already know, like Humankind..
see them playing at the The Church

It's part of Emergenza the Worlds biggest Live Band Festival..

Bands and set times posted...

07:30 STOP FOR CAPES Blues
20:00 MONTVALE Pop Punk
20:30 HUMANKIND Grunge
21:00 VIOLETTE Jazz funk
21:30 GOLD STAR MORNING Alternative pop
22:00 HEMLOK Progressive rock
22:30 BOOGIE BROTHERS Dance
23:00 GUIDED BY WIRES Metal Punk

Emergenza Shows

Looking forward to seeing a sample of some new bands.

HumanKind have a recent new album Monster Minor and will hopefully have time to play a song from one of their previous Albums like "spit out the seed".

Listen to HumanKind - Myspace
http://www.humankindb...

Support the bands you like as they engage in this world wide Battle of the bands.
Tickets for Emergenza show #8 are $15.

Hope to meetup with you there...
item.how_to_find_us: I'll give a cell phone number to those signed up.
item.name: Emergenza Show #8 @ The Church
